mapper.select: SELECT u.public_id , u.nickname , u.name , u.thumbnail_url , EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM follows f2 WHERE f2.follower_id = f.following_id AND f2.following_id = f.follower_id AND f2.is_active = 1 ) as is_followed_back FROM follows f JOIN users u ON f.follower_id = u.id WHERE f.following_id = #{userId} AND f.is_active = 1 AND u.is_active = 1 ORDER BY is_followed_back DESC, public_id
